      • escapeAsBashString

        public static String escapeAsBashString(String str)
        Quotes a string to be passed to Bash, if necessary. Uses single quotes to prevent variable expansion, `...` evaluation etc.
        Parameters:
        str - string to quote
        Returns:
        possibly quoted string

      • escapeAsPythonString

        public static String escapeAsPythonString(String str)
        Returns:
        a double-quoted string with metacharacters and quotes escaped with a backslash; non-ASCII characters escaped as \u
